title: San Francisco/SoMa
name: Yerba Buena Ice Skating Center
price: $8 adults, $6.25 children, $5.50 seniors. Skate rental extra
content: The only permanent indoor ice skating rink in San Francisco, and perhaps the most beautiful, with floor-to-ceiling windows giving a superb panoramic view of the surrounding area. Open year-round. Check the Ice Center schedule online for public skating hours.
